description: The Concept ID for the higher-level concept that forms the ancestor in the relationship.
The Concept ID for the lower-level concept that forms the descendant in the relationship.
The minimum number of hierarchical levels separating ancestor and descendant concepts. Used to simplify hierarchical analysis.
comment: Minimum separation between ancestor and descendant concepts.

description: The maximum number of hierarchical levels separating ancestor and descendant concepts. Used to simplify hierarchical analysis.
comment: Maximum separation between ancestor and descendant concepts.
